welcome_message_body: Welcome to Banfield, Argentina! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Banfield has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Broome
restaurants.description: Broome is a comfort food restaurant located in Lomas de Zamora.
restaurants.address: Leandro N. Alem 901 (esq. Las Heras), B1828CEA Lomas De Zamora, Buenos Aires
